body_html:
Thank you Paul!

I changed the statement tf.GraphKeys.VARIABLES to tf.GraphKeys.GLOBAL_VARIABLES in function build_image_embeddings as well as in function setup_global_step. The training process started without any other problem.

Thank you for your help. :)

Best,
Soner

body:
Thank you Paul!

I changed the statement tf.GraphKeys.VARIABLES to tf.GraphKeys.GLOBAL_VARIABLES in function build_image_embeddings as well as in function setup_global_step. The training process started without any other problem.

Thank you for your help. :)

Best,
Soner
